bar-color.desc: This is the color of the middle bars. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

border-color.desc: This is the color of outside border when `no-border` property is not `true`. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

color.desc: This is the color of the background (header and footer). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

text-color.desc: This is the color of the text (header and footer). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

inner-color.desc: This is the color of the background (scroller area). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

inner-text-color.desc: This is the color of the text (scroller area). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

dense.desc: If the component should be in dense mode

disable.desc: If the component should be disabled

rounded-border.desc: If the component should have rounded corners

no-border.desc: If the component should not have a border

no-shadow.desc: If the component should not display shadow when header/footer are displayed

no-header.desc: If the component should not display the header

no-footer.desc: If the component should not display the footer
